name: Dotspaces: ACT 1
description:
THIS GAME ISN'T INTENDED FOR CHILDREN

A cute game where the characters says and do...not so cute stuff. You'll see a loli say no-no words a lot of times.

This is basically a remake of L u c i y n. - The Story of a Little Girl with Big Dreams, however, with much more content (that includes more chapters).
Unfortunately, your choices doesn't matter that much, and wouldn't alter the story and/or the ending.

Follow the story of Luciyn, a teen girl that will quit her boring life after knowing her pet toad is the goddess' offspring.

Available in Brazilian Portuguese and English.

Credits

  • Everything else is made by me.
  • Soundtrack by Chicken Glove and Samfree.
  • CloudNovel® engine and it's logo are a property of CloudNovel LLC.
